summary: A harrowing psychological thriller from a widely acclaimed filmmaker, Daylight pits a couple lost in America against a conniving gang of kidnappers, in David Barker's rigorous and personal re-imagining of the genre film.
cast: Alexandra Meierhans|Ivan Martin|Michael Godere|Aidan Redmond|Brian Bickerstaff|Kendrick Strauch|Aylam Orian|Sabina Kurz
title: Daylight
